A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was stupid to say the least. Leia surviving outer space and floating back to the ship like a witch\, Luke having some weird outer body experience\, the pointless casino plot and scene\, the wasted Captain Phasma\, no one knowing who or what Snoke is\, does or how he even became anything to the Dark Side and the corny humor used to generate laughs. Terrible and not worth seeing ever again.
